title: For equity play, new-age tech is the place to bet on: Shankar Sharma - Economic Times
content: For equity play, new-age tech is the place to bet on: Shankar Sharma  Economic Times
description: This year's budget has no parallel in cricket history: i.e., 5 straight sixes to take India to safety. But let's back up a bit: for me, the defining characteristic of this government's economic policy has been the junking of the shibboleth of the 'fiscal deficit'. I have long argued that fiscal deficit is a meaningless number in defining economic prudence.
